Thanks for a great upload, extremezone. V 10, A 10. Plays fine thru WDTV Live. Video is perfect, surprising for a 700MB rip. Movie itself is a gem.

To make the subtitles work, users will need to open up the RAR file in the torrent's "Subs" folder and move its IDX and SUBS (look inside the second RAR) files to the same folder as the movie.

If you don't speak French the subs come in handy at 47:33.
